content:
A powerful calling - it must be from the "Luca Cluster"!
Time to fall asleep and return to the Heart of Luca.
info: 露卡之心—初次接触雕塑_

content:
A powerful resonance with this point of light...!
Wrapped in a blanket of drowsiness, I long to return to bed and drift into dreams.
info: 露卡之心—初次接触雕塑_
